code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Crud(){const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[text,setText]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetchItems();},[]);const fetchItems=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("/api/items");setItems(res.data);};const addItem=async()=>{await axios.post("/api/items",{text});setText("");fetchItems();};const deleteItem=async id=>{await axios.delete("/api/items/"+id);fetchItems();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"CRUD Items"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addItem,children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:items.map(i=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[i.text," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteItem(i._id),children:"Delete"})]},i._id))})]});}export default Crud;
